storyInfo: Pursuing a case of theft of military Originium products, Bagpipe under the Tempest Platoon arrives at County Hillock, and conducts an assault operation at a certain warehouse from her intel.

attributes.text: 'And the tracks run hauling my home with creak and cry,'
'I found an acorn rolling in the gutter all alone, and right by a rivet rusted all of its chrome...'

attributes.content: We've entered the warehouse. Investigation team, report status.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Leader. Vital signs to the southeast. Seven shelves away from you, moving within one meter.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Number of heads?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: One.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Any Originium response?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: None for the time being.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Good. Hold your positions.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What are you looking for?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Doesn't it sound like someone's singin'?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Don't get distracted. This means our target's guard is down.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Keep to the plan. Wait for my signal, then you charge. For now, keep moving in.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Five, four, three...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ready—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bunker destroyed!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Ack—
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *hack*... Wh—what's going on? All this smoke out of nowhere!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Don't move! Stay where you are, raise both your hands up!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I—I... you're... Victorian soldiers?
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: What do you mean by that? Aren't you Victorian too?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: He's looking to run. Cello, watch to intercept!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Leader, he's not headin' for the exit, he's turned back—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Triangle! Target heading for the back shelves! If you pick up any Originium response, open fire immediately!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Everyone else, form behind my shield!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Quick!!!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe, what are you doing?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'm coverin' it! Everyone, run!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Leader, no Originium response. That's not a bomb under Bagpipe.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: Oh! False alarm.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And the target...?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Sorry, I knocked him a little hard. He won't be standin' for a while.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: And what of the boxes?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll take a peek. All potatoes and carrots, and cauliflowers too! I squashed 'em flat. Shame, they seemed just fine for eatin'.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Stay alert.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: This one, this one, and this one... they're all the same. Leader, it's all produce and grains in here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Triangle, watch for anyone else nearing our perimeter.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Oboe, you search the warehouse with Bagpipe. Signal on any discovery.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Cello, take this man stuck on the floor and tie him up.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Right now, sir, we're going to need you to answer a few questions.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I—I don't know anything. I'm here for sorting the potatoes.
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Are you from County Hillock?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Have you heard of any spectre force?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Spectre... what? *cough*, *cough* *cough*... Doesn't force mean people like you lot, all the soldiers?
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: They took Lowry, Julia and Chris away... is it—is it my turn now?
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: I want you to calm down.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Listen. We have people who saw a batch of Originium goods enter this warehouse late last night. And now, those goods aren't here. You need to give me an explanation.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Explanation? That's what you're looking for? You're not going to just hang me? I—I... *pteuch*.
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Hey! What are you spittin' around for? You've gotta care about hygiene!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Any leads?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: None, it's potatoes everywhere. If our information wasn't wrong, then they must work a sight fast.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bring him. He definitely knows something, he's just not willing to open up.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: There it is... you're all the same! Dying to find faults in all of us, torturing us... you Victorian oppressor beasts!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Eh? Again? He thinks callin' another Victorian 'Victorian' counts as an insult? It's flyin' over my head.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Leader, incoming.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: How many?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Prepare to break up.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Yes, Leader.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Update, Leader, they seem to be our own.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: They're in here.
(Leader, we're surrounded.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Going by the numbers, yes.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (If you listen to the voices, there don't seem to be too many left outside. If I crack the wall by me, then we've got our chance!)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Don't get hasty.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I see you've had a very fierce confrontation in here.
Rita Skamandros, 7th Frontline Infantry Battalion, 2nd Tempest Platoon Leader.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Nice to meet you, Lieutenant Skamm... Skamandros.
My name isn't too easy to remember. You can call me Horn, Captain.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Very well, Horn. I'm Kelly, Louis Kelly. I'm sorry, codenames aren't our style.
Captain Kelly, you and your troops are presumably also here to investigate this warehouse.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Correct, we've received the tip-off too.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Then you ought to understand how grave this situation is. A great deal of illicit Originium goods were stolen off a military transport a couple months ago, and ultimately came to vanish in this region.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: I need not remind you, Captain, with this much ordnance, coupled with recent thefts in surrounding counties—if fallen into felonious hands, the menace posed will reach far beyond County Hillock.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Good, thank you for the run-down. I understand.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: And we're very thankful for your cooperation.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hill!
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Take this young man... this suspect back to camp.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: What? It was mad for us gettin' this man as our lead!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Sir, her spear is obstructing fulfillment of my duty.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Bagpipe, let it go.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But our mission—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: —We're on Hillock land right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain Kelly pulls a handkerchief from his pocket, and wipes the sweat on his forehead.
Very glad we could persuade you, Lieutenant. You and this young Vouivre lady, and all others present...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Ahem—you must be certainly worn out by your hard journey, dashing here from Londinium.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: It's our duty as soldiers of Victoria.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes, quite right. Now, if you still have intention to operate in County Hillock...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: We're obliged to continue tracking the thieved Originium goods. This is an order from Londinium. I imagine Colonel Hamilton would see sense too.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Of course, of course. You may accompany me back to camp.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Leader, do we really have to give him up to them? They have to be doin' this on purpose! Ever since we touched foot on the outskirt plate, they've been followin' right behind!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Right until now, just as we caught him—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: 'Stationed troops of the Empire have a responsibility to address any threat to public safety that arises within their station.'
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They haven't violated any code.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ugh... alright.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Captain, he's yours. As per code, we may also take part in the interrogation—we hope you recall.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ha, hahah... yes, quite in line with code.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: N—No... let me go! Don't take me!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Heh...
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Help me... save my soul! I haven't done anything... I don't know...
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Aaarghhh!
attributes.name: Panicked Youth

attributes.content: Hill...
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Tara rabble like him always do make a scene like this.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Take him away.
attributes.name: Captain Kelly

attributes.content: Ugh, really! What gives them the right!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Leader, I think... that wee Feline wants us to help him. He's scared to death of goin' with them.)
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Triangle?)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Here, Leader. Still in position, outside in the same tree. They haven't noticed me.
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: (Good. Take the reconnaissance group, and keep investigating along nearby transport routes. If you find any leads, immediately report back.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Understood. Are we notifying their barracks?
attributes.name: Triangle

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Be sure to defend yourselves.
attributes.name: Horn
